result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .FitniumUserGuide.FitGuides.ApiTest.SetUp (edit)
com.magneticreason.fitnium.BaseFitniumFixture

Set up the browser and connect to selenium

The server is located at localhost
The server is on port 4444
Using the browser *chrome start at http://localhost:8090/fitnium/
check is selenium initialised true
set speed to 100 milliseconds
set timeout to 20000 milliseconds
write to debug starting test

Lets first start at the Fitnium home page at Magnetic Reason

starting at URL testpage4api.html

wait for page to load for 5 seconds

check title of current page Magnetic Reason
check text of element xpath=//h1 Fitnium Test Page

check is Text Present This page contains all the elements neccassary to test Fitnium true
Alert Dialog APIs

click element id=btn_alert
check alert dialog message Alert Message

click element id=btn_alert
check alert dialog message is Alert Message true

click element id=btn_alert
store alert dialog message in alert

click element id=btn_alert
check has Alert Occurred true
close Alert Dialog


Prompt Dialog APIs

click element id=btn_prompt
check has Prompt Occurred true

click element id=btn_prompt
check Prompt Dialog Message Is this what you meant

click element id=btn_prompt
check Prompt Dialog Message is Is this what you meant true

click element id=btn_prompt
store prompt dialog message in prompt

answer yes On Next Prompt
click element id=btn_prompt
check has Prompt Occurred true
check Prompt Dialog Message Is this what you meant
close prompt Dialog

Confirmation Dialog APIs

choose Cancel On Next Confirmation
click element id=btn_confirm
check has Confirmation Occurred true
close confirmation Dialog

choose Cancel On Next Confirmation
click element id=btn_confirm
check Confirmation Dialog Message Do you want to continue ?

choose Cancel On Next Confirmation
click element id=btn_confirm
check Confirmation Dialog Message is Do you want to continue ? true

choose Cancel On Next Confirmation
click element id=btn_confirm
store confirmation dialog message in confirm

choose Cancel On Next Confirmation
click element id=btn_confirm
check has Confirmation Occurred true
check Confirmation Dialog Message Do you want to continue ?






Expand All | Collapse All
 Tear Down: .FitniumUserGuide.FitGuides.ApiTest.TearDown (edit)

close the browser
